remarks: The image structure of a group is a group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
imasgrp.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasgrp.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasgrp.p $e |- ( ph -> .+ = ( +g ` R ) ) $.
imasgrp.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasgrp.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( a e. V /\ b e. V ) /\ ( p e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` a ) = ( F ` p ) /\ ( F ` b ) = ( F ` q ) ) -> ( F ` ( a .+ b ) ) = ( F ` ( p .+ q ) ) ) ) $.
imasgrp.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Grp ) $.
imasgrp.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
imasgrp $p |- ( ph -> ( U e. Grp /\ ( F ` .0. ) = ( 0g ` U ) ) ) $.
$d .+ p q $.
$d .0. p q $.
$d B p q $.
$d F a b p q $.
$d R p q $.
$d U a b p q $.
$d V a b p q $.
$d a b p ph q $.
